markdown:
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 36 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 34 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 31 [Duergar Slave Lord](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1574) **Source** [Pathfinder #148: Fires of the Haunted City](/Sources.aspx?ID=13) pg. 50 **Perception** +26; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Dwarven](/Languages.aspx?ID=3), [Undercommon](/Languages.aspx?ID=11) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +25, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +23, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +22, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +21, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +27, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +26 **Str** +4 **Dex** +8 **Con** +3 **Int** +2 **Wis** +5 **Cha** +3 **Items** _+2 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [composite longbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=74)_ (100 arrows), _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [hatchet](/Weapons.aspx?ID=27)_ (2), key to the Temple of All Gods, +1 [resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [studded leather](/Armor.aspx?ID=5) --- **AC** 35 **Fort** +21 **Ref** +28 **Will** +23 +2 status to all saves vs. magic **HP** 240 **Improved Evasion** When a duergar slave lord rolls a success on a Reflex save, they get a critical success instead. When they roll a critical failure on a Reflex save, they get a failure instead. Finally, when they fail a Reflex save against a damaging effect, they take half damage.
**[Light Blindness](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=22)** --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** _hatchet_ +28 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)), **Damage** 2d6+10 slashing **Ranged** _composite longbow_ +29 ([deadly 1d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Propulsive](/Traits.aspx?ID=191), [range increment 100 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254), [volley 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=201)), **Damage** 2d8+8 piercing **Occult Innate Spells** DC 33 - **2nd** [Enlarge](/Spells.aspx?ID=102) (self only), [Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164) (self only) **Hunt Prey** ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32)) The slave lord designates as its prey a single creature that they can see or hear or that they are [Tracking](/Actions.aspx?ID=66). They gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks when they [Seek](/Actions.aspx?ID=84) their prey and a +2 circumstance bonus to [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) checks when they track their prey. They also ignore the penalty for making ranged attacks within their second range increment against their prey.
The first time a slave lord hits their hunted prey in a round, they deal 2d8 additional precision damage. A slave lord can have only one prey designated at a time. **Hunter's Flurry** **Frequency** once per round; **Effect** The slave lord makes two bow Strikes or two melee Strikes, each using a different weapon. These Strikes must target the slave lord's prey. If both Strikes hit, combine their damage for the purpose of resistances and weaknesses.
name: Duergar Slave Lord

text: Duergar Slave Lord Recall Knowledge - Humanoid (Society): DC 36 Unspecific Lore : DC 34 Specific Lore : DC 31 Duergar Slave Lord Source Pathfinder #148: Fires of the Haunted City pg. 50 Perception +26; darkvision Languages Common, Dwarven, Undercommon Skills Acrobatics +25, Athletics +23, Intimidation +22, Society +21, Stealth +27, Survival +26 Str +4 Dex +8 Con +3 Int +2 Wis +5 Cha +3 Items +2 striking composite longbow (100 arrows), +1 striking hatchet (2), key to the Temple of All Gods, +1 resilient studded leather --- AC 35 Fort +21 Ref +28 Will +23 +2 status to all saves vs. magic HP 240 Improved Evasion When a duergar slave lord rolls a success on a Reflex save, they get a critical success instead. When they roll a critical failure on a Reflex save, they get a failure instead. Finally, when they fail a Reflex save against a damaging effect, they take half damage. Light Blindness --- Speed 25 feet Melee Single Action hatchet +28 (Agile, Finesse, Magical, versatile S), Damage 2d6+10 slashing Ranged Single Action composite longbow +29 (deadly 1d10, Magical, Propulsive, range increment 100 feet, reload 0, volley 30 feet), Damage 2d8+8 piercing Occult Innate Spells DC 33 - 2nd Enlarge (self only), Invisibility (self only) Hunt Prey Single Action (Concentrate) The slave lord designates as its prey a single creature that they can see or hear or that they are Tracking. They gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks when they Seek their prey and a +2 circumstance bonus to Survival checks when they track their prey. They also ignore the penalty for making ranged attacks within their second range increment against their prey. The first time a slave lord hits their hunted prey in a round, they deal 2d8 additional precision damage. A slave lord can have only one prey designated at a time. Hunter's Flurry Single Action Frequency once per round; Effect The slave lord makes two bow Strikes or two melee Strikes, each using a different weapon. These Strikes must target the slave lord's prey. If both Strikes hit, combine their damage for the purpose of resistances and weaknesses.
